Variable.Name: PasteFailError
Variable.Value: Copy the Custom Note to the clipboard and select the Item/Item Revision to which that custom note has to be associated.

Variable.Name: AttachDuplicateStandardNoteError
Variable.Value: The instance cannot be saved because it contains at least one attribute that violates a unique attribute rule.

Variable.Name: FinishGroupCreationByPastingItemError
Variable.Value: The given tag () does not exist in the database or is not a persistent object tag.

Variable.Name: AttachDuplicateStandardNoteError@1
Variable.Value: The object "sStdNote" is already related to the object "sItemName" through the relation "Standard Notes Lists".
